original:
N-linked glycans play a crucial role in protein folding and cellular attachment, and they can also modulate protein function, sometimes acting as an on-off switch. 


Glycomics, akin to genomics and proteomics, refers to the systematic study of all glycan structures present in a specific cell type or organism. It is a specialized area within the broader field of glycobiology.
